text: (upbeat music)

- My name is Manny Lewis,
I'm an Account Manager

on the Media &
Entertainment vertical team.
Before I was at AWS,
I was at a telecom company for 12 years.
You're moving from telecom to cloud.

How will you ever be
able to make that jump?
Will I do well here?

At AWS specifically,
they had the training,
onboarding, peers, networking needed

so that you could be a
generalist or expert in the cloud
if you wanted to dive deep enough.
What I saw in AWS was a new career path,
one that's in the future,
one that is doing and solving problems
that the future will need,

whether it be autonomous
vehicles, or space flight,

or algorithms helping
us make better decisions
in the community.

The one thing that's different
about AWS is just the scale
of what they do,

and when you think about
the greater Amazon,
the scale of what they do.
I'm always excited, always challenged,
but activated, I think, is the best word.
You're constantly learning.

You're constantly learning
how to fix problems

and use the resources
that you have around you.
What we're doing is helping customers.

What we're doing is
cutting-edge, and it's exciting.
And there's a good culture around it

and a good network of
people that can help you.
